Building Dignity Through Universal Basic Income

Empowering lives in Argentina and Ukraine with predictable support, skills, and opportunity. At 0xMintyn Foundation, we believe financial security fuels dignity and innovation.

Join 12,450+ lives already transformed through our UBI programs across Argentina and Ukraine.

ABOUT US

At 0xMintyn Foundation, we believe financial security fuels dignity and innovation. Our mission is to provide Universal Basic Income (UBI) that not only covers essential needs but also sparks creativity, skills, and entrepreneurship in Argentina and Ukraine.

Our Vision

A world where financial security enables human potential and innovation.

Our Approach

Blockchain transparency meets local partnerships for measurable impact.

Our Impact

We support both unskilled and skilled individuals by delivering:

  • Monthly guaranteed stipends for survival and stability

  • $2,000 one-time UBI to poor unskilled individuals for their transition into skilled professions

  • $1,000 monthly UBI to skilled individuals to develop digital products like software, ebooks, and courses

OUR PROGRAMS.

Comprehensive UBI solutions for every stage of human development.

Monthly Support

(Essential Living)
Monthly

Reliable monthly stipends cover essentials like food, healthcare, and utilities—giving families stability and the dignity to plan ahead.

Program Features:

  • Fixed monthly transfers via secure digital wallets

  • Financial literacy resources and local partner support

  • Transparent, auditable distributions on-chain

01.

Skills Grant

(Career Change)
One-time$2,000

Targeted grants help unskilled individuals transition into sustainable professions through accredited training and apprenticeships.

Program Features:

  • Tuition and materials for certified programs

  • Mentorship and job placement support

  • Milestone-based disbursement for accountability

02.

Digital Creators

(Innovation)
Monthly$1,000

Supports skilled individuals building digital products—software, ebooks, courses—until completion and launch.

Program Features:

  • Monthly UBI to cover living costs while building

  • Access to mentors, reviewers, and distribution support

  • Outcome tracking with demo and release milestones

03.

Startup UBI

(Entrepreneurship)
Team Support$1,000 monthly per founder

Group-based UBI for founders building early-stage ventures—focus on innovation while we help cover essentials.

Program Features:

  • Team eligibility, milestone check-ins, and demo days

  • Connections to incubators and early customers

  • Graduation upon launch or revenue targets

04.

Local Hubs & Community Care

(Physical Support Centers)
OngoingBuenos Aires, Córdoba, and Kyiv

Community centers in Buenos Aires, Córdoba, and Kyiv provide digital wallet help, psychosocial care, training access, and community events.

Program Features:

  • On-site support for onboarding and cash-out

  • Workshops: finance, digital tools, entrepreneurship

  • Care referrals with trusted local partners

05.

OUR IMPACT

Every number represents a life transformed: children in school, families fed, and new ventures launched. Our measurable impact across Argentina and Ukraine demonstrates the power of Universal Basic Income to create lasting change.

Success Stories

Skills Grant Success
“Thanks to 0xMintyn, I transitioned from unskilled work to a skilled trade. The $2000 grant was life-changing. Now I'm a certified electrician earning 3x more than before.”
Maria Rodriguez — Córdoba, Electrician
Digital Creator Success
“The $1000 monthly support allowed me to finish my first ebook and launch my online course. Now I earn $3,500/month teaching others.”
Alex Petrov — Kyiv, Course Creator
Startup Success
“With the monthly UBI support, my team and I could focus on building our app. We just secured $50K in funding and hired 3 more people.”
Carlos Mendez — Buenos Aires, Startup Founder

PARTNER WITH US

We collaborate with NGOs, local governments, and technology partners to expand access to UBI and entrepreneurship opportunities. Join us in building a more equitable future.

Ways to Partner

  • Sponsor a UBI program in your region
  • Provide training, mentorship, or startup incubation
  • Support through donations or volunteering
